name: CookieFcuk V1.1
description:
Super customizable!
-Change the golden cookie opacity you cheater!
-Stores are either too big or too small!
-Beautiful fonts! Comic Sans!
-Fancy separators!
-Awesome screen options!
-White borders instead of gold!
-Notes are over there!
-Fcuk that top bar!

Known bugs: Bakery name and Cookies appear over info and settings, Does not affect gameplay.
